title: "The race to develop A.I. chips heats up as Graphcore says it's shipped 'tens of thousands'"
excerpt: "Microsoft is using Graphcore’s chips in some of its data centers and Dell is selling them on a server. Graphcore has raised over $450 million from the likes of Sequoia, BMW, DeepMind’s co-founders and C4 Ventures."
